product_name: TYR Big Mesh Mummy Gear Bag
long_description: A perfect choice for hauling swim and workout gear, the TYR Big Mesh Mummy Gear Bag has a spacious main compartment for storage and mesh venting for quick drainage and less dry time. 20.25 x 23.5 in. bag features shoulder straps for easy transport. Barrel-lock closures provide quick and easy access to your gear. The light and functional TYR Big Mesh Mummy Gear Bag sports a water bottle pocket and a side zipper pocket for additional organization.
short_description: A perfect choice for hauling swim and workout gear, the TYR Big Mesh Mummy Gear Bag has a spacious main compartment for storage and mesh venting for quick drainage and less dry time.
